text: Mićo Mićić (6 September 1956 – 23 December 2020) was a Bosnian Serb politician. He was mayor of Bijeljina from 2004 until his death in 2020. He was a member of the Serb Democratic Party. Mićić was born in Bijeljina. Mićić died on 23 December 2020 at a hospital in Bijeljina from COVID-19 at the age of 64. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina politicians Category:Mayors
title: Mićo Mićić
